attributes.action: Calling for Nick Griffin to resign as an MEP
attributes.additional_details:
After Nick Griffins tweet: '"A British Justice team will come up to [their Huntington address] & give you [Black and Morgan] a... bit of drama by way of reminding you that an English couple's home is their castle. Say No to heterophobia!'

This is unacceptable behaviour for an MEP and needs to resign from his position.
